per_frame_init_1=t1=100+bass*100;
per_frame_init_2=t2=100+treb*100;
per_frame_init_3=t3=100+bass_att*100;
per_frame_init_4=t4=100+treb_att*100;
per_frame_1=db=(bass-lbass)*fps*.1;
per_frame_2=lbass=bass;
per_frame_3=avgdb=avgdb*.99+abs(db)*.01;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=dt=(treb-ltreb)*fps*.06;
per_frame_6=ltreb=treb;
per_frame_7=avgdt=avgdt*.99+abs(dt)*.01;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=pitch=(sin(avgdt)+cos(avgdb))*.5+.5;
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=fc=60/fps;
per_frame_15=q6=avgdt;
per_frame_16=bb=above(abs(db),avgdb*6);
per_frame_17=bt=above(abs(dt),avgdt*6);
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=t1=t1+(avgdb*.1*(1.5-pitch)+bb*db)*fc;
per_frame_20=t2=t2+(avgdt*.1*pitch+bt*dt)*fc;
per_frame_21=t3=t3+abs(db)*.1*fc;
per_frame_22=t4=t4+abs(dt)*.1*fc;
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(t1-t4);
per_frame_27=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(t2-t3);
per_frame_28=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_29=warp = 0;
per_frame_30=wave_x = wave_x + 0.1*cos(1.2*t2)*sin(1.1*t1)-0.1*sin(0.61*3);
per_frame_31=wave_y = wave_y + 0.1*sin(1.2*t1)*cos(4.1*t4)-0.11*cos(1.1*t3);
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=ob_r = 1-abs(wave_b);
per_frame_34=ob_b = 1-abs(wave_g);
per_frame_35=ob_g = 1-abs(wave_r);
per_frame_36=ib_a=.5;
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=
per_frame_39=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_40=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(.1*t2)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_frame_41=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(.1*t1)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_frame_42=
per_frame_43=
per_frame_44=q1=dx_r;
per_frame_45=q2=dy_r;
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=q3=t1;
per_frame_48=q4=t2;
per_frame_49=q5=t3;
per_frame_50=q6=t4;
per_frame_51=
per_frame_52=wrap=1;
per_frame_53=
per_frame_54=decay=1;
per_pixel_1=dx_r=q1;
per_pixel_2=dy_r=q2;
per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=xbar = above(sin(q3),0)*abs(1.4-x*sin(1.4*cos(y*q4*.1))) +
per_pixel_6=below(sin(q3),0)*sin((0.5-y)*sin(3*cos(dx_r*y*q3*.1)));
per_pixel_7=ybar = above(cos(q4),0)*abs(1.4-y*sin(1.4*cos(x*q4*.1))) +
per_pixel_8=below(cos(q4),0)*sin((0.5-x)*sin(3*cos(dy_r*x*q3*.1)));
per_pixel_9=
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=c1=above(sin(rad*3.14+q6*.1-q5*.1),.5+sin(q5*.1-q3*.25)*.5);
per_pixel_12=c2=below(abs(sin(x*sin((q5-q4)*.017)-y*sin((q3-q6)*.013))*1 ),.5+sin(q4*.21-q5*.1)*.5);
per_pixel_13=c3=above(sin(y*3.14),.5+sin(q6*.0012-q4*.33)*.5);
per_pixel_14=c4=below(1-sin(y*3.14-sin(q5*.1+x)),.5+sin(q3*.27-q6*.1)*.5);
per_pixel_15=
per_pixel_16=
per_pixel_17=dx1 =  dx_r*cos(6.28*xbar);
per_pixel_18=dy1 =  dy_r*cos(6.28*ybar);
per_pixel_19=
per_pixel_20=
per_pixel_21=c=sin(q5*.1);
per_pixel_22=cc=sin(q3*.1);
per_pixel_23=ccc=sin(q4*.1);
per_pixel_24=cx1=.5+ccc*.3;
per_pixel_25=cy1=.5+cc*.4;
per_pixel_26=
per_pixel_27=myx=(cx1-x);
per_pixel_28=myy=(cy1-(1-y));
per_pixel_29=mrad=pow( myx*myx + myy*myy , .5);
per_pixel_30=mang=asin( abs(myy)/(mrad) );
per_pixel_31=
per_pixel_32=ax=mang;
per_pixel_33=ay=mang;
per_pixel_34=
per_pixel_35=mrot=.1*(1-mrad)*sin(q4*.01+q6*.1);
per_pixel_36=
per_pixel_37=dx2= sign(myy)*sin(ax)*mrot;
per_pixel_38=dy2= sign(myx)*(cos(ay)*mrot);
per_pixel_39=
per_pixel_40=
per_pixel_41=
per_pixel_42=cx2=.5+cc*.3;
per_pixel_43=cy2=.5+c*.25+ccc*.25;
per_pixel_44=
per_pixel_45=myx=(cx2-x);
per_pixel_46=myy=(cy2-(1-y));
per_pixel_47=mrad=pow( myx*myx + myy*myy , .5);
per_pixel_48=mang=asin( abs(myy)/(mrad) );
per_pixel_49=
per_pixel_50=ax=mang;
per_pixel_51=ay=mang;
per_pixel_52=
per_pixel_53=mrot=.1*(1-mrad)*sin(q3*.02+q5*.3);
per_pixel_54=
per_pixel_55=dx3= sign(myy)*sin(ax)*mrot;
per_pixel_56=dy3=  sign(myx)*(cos(ay)*mrot);
per_pixel_57=
per_pixel_58=//rot=atan2(atan2(rad,tan(time*bass)),sin(2.14*tan(time*1.13*treb)));
per_pixel_59=
per_pixel_60=//zoom=1+c1*.013+c2*.031-c3*.024-c4*.028;
per_pixel_61=zoom = zoom - 0.05*(1-c4-c3+c2)*sin((q6-q5+q8)*.01);
per_pixel_62=
per_pixel_63=//dx=dx1*(c2-c3)+dx2*(c4-c2)+dx3*(c3-c4);
per_pixel_64=//dy=dy1*(c2-c3)+dy2*(c4-c2)+dy3*(c3-c4);
per_pixel_65=
per_pixel_66=//sx=1-2*c2*c4;
per_pixel_67=//sy=1-2*c1*c3;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    float3 txr = float3(uv,q1*0.1);
warp_5=`    float2  uv2 =  uv;
warp_6=`    uv2 = uv + texsize.zx*(q3,q3);
warp_7=`    float3 color = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_8=`    color += tex2D(sampler_noise_mq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_9=`    color += tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_10=`    uv += color*0.01; 
warp_11=`    //uv.y += abs(color*0.01) + bass_att*0.01;
warp_12=`    
warp_13=`    float2x2 rot = { cos(q9), sin(q9),
warp_14=`                      -sin(q9), cos(q9) }; 
warp_15=`
warp_16=`
warp_17=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, mul(((uv-0.5)*(0.97 + rad*0.02)),rot) + 0.5  
warp_18=`          + GetBlur1((uv - 0.5)*0.9 + 0.5)*(uv.y*0.1)  - 0.01).xyz;    
warp_19=`    ret = ret-0.001;// - 0.08; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_20=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float3 crisp = tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
comp_5=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(uv - 0.01*crisp);
comp_6=`   
comp_7=`float3 ret1 = crisp + saturate(3* (blur-float3(0.1,.1,.2)));
comp_8=`
comp_9=`ret = ret1*1.3;
comp_10=`}
